1 \defgroup external-thread-mode ExternalThread Mode
2 
3 \details
4 
5 Sometimes, it is more effective to perform the event dispatching in a loop in the main application thread.
6 For this purpose, one can use the OnixS::B3::BOE::ThreadingModel::External mode.
7 
8 \section stack-creation Stack
9 
10 Before an externally-managed session is created, the application must create an OnixS::B3::BOE::SessionReactor instance.
11 There are two reactor classes, which can be used:
12 
13 - OnixS::B3::BOE::TcpDirectStack
14 - OnixS::B3::BOE::TcpStandardStack
15 
16 \snippet TCPStandard.cpp createStack
17 
18 The reference to the stack is provided in Session's constructor, for example:
19 \snippet TCPStandard.cpp createSession
20 
21 \section tcpregular-connect-and-disconnect Asynchronous Connect and Disconnect
22 
23 Applications must call asynchronous Session's methods to connect (OnixS::B3::BOE::Session::connectAsync) and disconnect
24 (OnixS::B3::BOE::Session::disconnectAsync).
25 
26 \snippet TCPStandard.cpp connect-and-disconnect
27 
28 \section tcpstandard-event-loop Dispatching Network Events
29 
30 Applications must call OnixS::B3::BOE::TcpStandardStack::dispatchEvents frequently for each stack that is in use.
31 
32 \snippet TCPStandard.cpp dispatching
33 
34 \section tcpstandard-stack-shutdown Shutdown
35 
36 The TCPStandard stack requires finishing all outstanding work and handling all outstanding events.
37 Before destroying the OnixS::B3::BOE::TcpStandardStack instance, the following code should be executed:
38 \snippet TCPStandard.cpp ensureQuiescent
39 
40 Method OnixS::B3::BOE::TcpStandardStack::isQuiescent returns a boolean value indicating whether a stack is quiescent.
41 
42 This can be used to ensure that all connections have been closed gracefully before destroying a stack (or exiting the
43 application). Destroying a stack while it is not quiescent is permitted by the API, but when doing so there is no guarantee
44 that sent data has been acknowledged by the peer or even transmitted, and there is the possibility that peers' connections
45 will be reset.
